data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Fatehpur, Uttar Pradesh, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Fatehpur, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Fatehpur, Uttar Pradesh, India. Please, stir the 28,960 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Fatehpur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Fatehpur unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the county of Fatehpur.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Rajput Gautam (Muslim traditions) people. Make the Rajput Gautam (Muslim traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, help the 28,960 believers in Fatehpur to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Fatehpur, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 28,960 believers in Fatehpur, Uttar Pradesh, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.
